question: What is the theme of 2018 International Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery and Transatlantic Slave Trade?
option2: Breaking the Silence, Lest We Forget
option3: Remember Slavery: Triumphs and Struggles for Freedom and Equality
option4: Women and Slavery: Honour the African Diaspora
answer: Remember Slavery: Triumphs and Struggles for Freedom and Equality
explanation: The International Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery and Transatlantic Slave Trade is observed every year on March 25 to honour and remember those who suffered and died at the hands of the brutal slavery system. The International Day also aims to raise awareness about the dangers of racism and prejudice today. The 2018 theme is \"Remember Slavery: Triumphs and Struggles for Freedom and Equality\", which celebrates the gains of people of African descent from slavery to present. It also acknowledges the challenges that have been overcome in the movement towards freedom and equality in all professions.
